roleset.name: to go away, leave

example.name: both arguments
example.text: [*-1] Departing from decades of Soviet dogma , [the new system]-1 would lead to big differences in pay between workers and almost certainly to unemployment .

example.name: With destination
example.text: [He]-1's moved on since his acquittal, like Gary Glitter did after his 1999 conviction, *PRO*-1 having departed last June for a Bahrain "vacation" from which he's yet to emerge.
example.arg: for a Bahrain "vacation" from which he's yet to emerge

roleset.note: VN, FN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls resign-10.11, escape-51.1

predicate.note: Frames file for 'depart' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
